name: Niphilim Divided
description:
Controls:

W A S D - Movement

Left Click - Attack (Note: Attacks have a cooldown)

Shift - Change between angel and demon form

Esc - Pause Menu

Survive the waves of enemies as long as you can, change to demon at night and to the angel form at day. Player can attack the enemies only if they are in those forms at the right state of the game, The Enemies can attack the player if they are in the form of their enemies, but the player cannot attack them back if they are not in the right form. Pick up health potions to regain lost health.

Note:

If it gets buggy (The player death animation playing even when the health isn't zero etc.,) switch to forms  to fix it).
